sections.heading: duty of conservator.In the exercise of his or her powers, a conservator is to act as a fiduciary and shall comply with the prudent investor rule set forth in sections 30-3883 to 30-3889
sections.text: SourceLaws 1974, LB 354, ยง 264, UPC ยง 5-417;Laws 1997, LB 54, ยง 15;Laws 2003, LB 130, ยง 132.
